mcq.statement: Which Mughal emperor added Diwan-i-Aam, Sheesh Mahal, Naulakha Pavilion, and Moti Masjid to the Lahore Fort?
mcq.one_liner: The additions of Diwan-i-Aam, Sheesh Mahal, Naulakha Pavilion, and Moti Masjid to the Lahore Fort were made during the reign of **Shah Jahan**.

suggestions.topic: Historical Places in or Near Lahore
